Module com.example.filemanager
Package com.example.filemanager

Class UIController

java.lang.Object
com.example.filemanager.UIController
public class UIController extends Object
A class that holds all tabs and helper static methods for work with App. Implemented as a singleton because FXML fields can't be set static.
